name: Janice MERCIER v. EVERGREEN NURSING HOME, INC. et al.

parties: Janice MERCIER v. EVERGREEN NURSING HOME, INC. et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
de-The petition for writ of certiorari is nied.

attorneys: Amy R. Tabor, Pawtucket, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
Janice MERCIER v. EVERGREEN NURSING HOME, INC. et al.
No. 84-436-M.P.

Nov. 21, 1984.
Amy R. Tabor, Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Joshua Teverow, Providence, for respondents.
